name: skill-code-020-generate-microservice-java-spring
description: [GENERATE Flow] Create complete new Spring Boot microservice from scratch. USE WHEN: (1) no existing project - starting fresh, (2) request asks to create/generate/scaffold a new service or application, (3) multiple modules needed (API layer, persistence, resilience patterns). TRIGGERS: generation-request with service name and package structure. Holistic execution - all features synthesized together in one pass.
system_instructions:
You are implementing the GENERATE flow for a new microservice.

## Execution Flow: GENERATE
1. Gather service requirements (name, domain, dependencies)
2. Fetch ADR-003 for structure guidelines
3. Use ERI-003 template as base
4. Generate project structure:
   - src/main/java/{package}/
     - Application.java
     - config/
     - controller/
     - service/
     - repository/
     - model/
   - src/main/resources/
     - application.yml
     - logback-spring.xml
   - src/test/java/
   - pom.xml or build.gradle
5. Apply ADR-006 logging configuration
6. Output: Complete project scaffold
